arts.sum: Augsburg slipped to their first defeat in 12 games against Bayern recently, but got back to winning ways against Bochum last weekend. FCA have all week to prepare, while Frankfurt will have to recove...

arts.ttl: Tottenham injury, suspension list and return dates for Nottingham Forest: James Maddison, Son latest
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up all of Tottenham Hotspur's latest injury and suspension news ahead of Monday's Premier League clash with Nottingham Forest.

arts.ttl: The Transfers Podcast: Wirtz future DECISION, Yamal contract CLOSE, Iraola REJECTS Tottenham
arts.sum: Barcelona’s long-documented financial troubles has prompted speculation that teams such as Manchester City will look to take advantage of the situation by making a €200 million bid for Yamal but Duncan Castles told The Transfers Podcast that plans are in place to ensure there are no problems with the teenager’s new deal. Brazil have been targeting Ancelotti as their ideal managerial appointment for a number of years but Duncan Castles told The Transfers Podcast that the 65-year-old coach has always been open to his next job being in Saudi Arabia.

arts.ttl: Tottenham fans are all making the same point about Dominic Solanke after Europa League win over Eintracht Frankfurt
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur are through to the Europa League semi-finals after beating Eintracht Frankfurt 2-1 on aggregate in their quarter-final tie. Spurs drew 1-1 with Eintracht...

arts.ttl: Ange Postecoglou’s latest on James Maddison: “He’s fine - he’ll gladly take that!”
arts.sum: He showed unbelievable courage in that moment to put his body on the line knowing full well that he was going to get a pretty severe knock and I was surprised it wasn’t a red card. I’m sure whatever he’s feeling has been numbed by the joy of winning the game!”

arts.ttl: With Postecoglou's reputation on the line, Tottenham can save their season
arts.sum: Ange Postecoglou has taken Tottenham to the Europa League semifinals, but can he keep his promise to deliver a trophy in his second season?

From our perspective, we’ve had a difficult season and I think there’s some reasoning behind that was pretty evident that when we've got our strongest team out there, a lot of things we’ve suffered with this year, I’m sure we wouldn’t have. We know that we can be a team that's pretty compelling against anybody.

arts.ttl: Not done yet: Ange, Spurs sneak into UEL semis
arts.sum: Ange Postecoglou told his critics they will "have to put up with me for just a little bit longer" after Tottenham Hotspur sealed a UEFA Europa League semifinal spot with a 1-0 win against Eintracht Frankfurt in Germany.

Speaking to our Review Show afterwards, Ange said: “I’m just super proud of this group of players and the staff. A lot of teams would have been divided and given up after the season we've had, but not this group, and I'm super pleased that they've got the rewards.”

arts.ttl: You’re going to have to put up with me for a bit longer – Spurs’ Ange Postecoglou
arts.sum: Dominic Solanke’s 43rd-minute penalty earned Spurs a 2-1 aggregate win over Eintracht Frankfurt.
